Slack Workspace Organiser

Ordering your sidebar helps with productivity and makes it easier to find the right person, team or topic.

  • To share your sidebar ordering with others, organise your sidebar in to sections as you normally would using Slack, then click the export button below.
  • To import a sidebar ordering shared with you, click the import button below then paste the code you were provided with in the textarea. Once all your channels have been organised for you, Slack will automatically reload.
